name: Origin-server
tagline: Public open source repository for the OpenShift Origin server components
body:
#REST API Documentation version 1.5
####Resources
* [api](api)
* [domain](domain)
* [cartridge](cartridge)
* [authorization](authorization)
* [application](application)
* [alias](alias)

[api]

###api
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####API entry point
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/api
####Get environment information
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/environment
####Get user information
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/user
####List quickstarts
    GET https://localhost:8118/api/v1/quickstarts/promoted.json
####Retrieve quickstart with :id
    GET https://localhost:8118/api/v1/quickstarts/:id
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|:id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Search quickstarts
    GET https://localhost:8118/api/v1/quickstarts.json
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|search | Yes | [] | N/A|
[domain]###domain
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List domains
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains
####Create new domain
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Get domain
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69
####Update domain
    PUT https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Delete domain
    DELETE https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|force | No | [true, false] | false|
[cartridge]###cartridge
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List cartridges
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/cartridges
####Add embedded cartridge
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|name | Yes | ["mongodb-2.2", "cron-1.4", "phpmyadmin-3.4", "haproxy-1.4", "mock-plugin-0.1", "10gen-mms-agent-0.1", "postgresql-8.4", "switchyard-0.6", "metrics-0.1", "jenkins-client-1.4", "mysql-5.1", "rockmongo-1.1"] | N/A|
|colocate_with | No | ["diy-0.1"] | |
|scales_from | No | [] | |
|scales_to | No | [] | |
|additional_storage | No | [] | |
|url | No | [] | |
####List embedded cartridges
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges
####Get cartridge
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
####Update cartridge configuration
    PUT https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|additional_gear_storage | No | [] | |
|scales_from | No | [] | |
|scales_to | No | [] | |
####Start embedded cartridge
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["start"] | N/A|
####Stop cartridge
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["stop"] | N/A|
####Restart cartridge
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["restart"] | N/A|
####Reload cartridge
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["reload"] | N/A|
####Delete cartridge
    DELETE https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
[authorization]###authorization
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List authorizations
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations
####Retrieve authorization :id
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations/:id
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|:id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Add new authorization
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|scope | No | ["session", "read", "userinfo"] | userinfo|
|note | No | [] | |
|expires_in | No | [] | -1|
|reuse | No | [true, false] | false|
####Get authorization
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b108c6701b2ea5e3000045
####Update authorization
    PUT https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b108c6701b2ea5e3000045
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|note | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Delete authorization
    DELETE https://localhost/broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b108c6701b2ea5e3000045
[application]###application
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List applications
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications
####Create new application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|name | Yes | [] | N/A|
|cartridges | No | ["diy-0.1", "php-5.3", "jbossas-7", "perl-5.10", "mock-0.1", "mock-0.2", "zend-5.6", "jenkins-1.4", "nodejs-0.6", "jbossews-2.0", "jbossews-1.0", "jbosseap-6.0", "python-2.6", "python-2.7", "python-3.3", "ruby-1.9", "ruby-1.8"] | |
|scale | No | [true, false] | false|
|gear_profile | No | ["small"] | small|
|initial_git_url | No | [] | |
|cartridges[][url] | No | [] | |
####Get application
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69
####Get application descriptor
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/descriptor
####Get application gear groups
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/gear_groups
####Start application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["start"] | N/A|
####Stop application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["stop"] | N/A|
####Restart application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["restart"] | N/A|
####Force stop application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["force-stop"] | N/A|
####Scale up application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["scale-up"] | N/A|
####Scale down application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["scale-down"] | N/A|
####Tidy the application framework
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["tidy"] | N/A|
####Reload the application
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["reload"] | N/A|
####Trigger thread dump
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/events
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["thread-dump"] | N/A|
####Delete application
    DELETE https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69
####Resolve DNS
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/dns_resolvable
[alias]###alias
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####Create new alias
    POST https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/aliases
####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
|ssl_certificate | No | [] | |
|private_key | No | [] | |
|pass_phrase | No | [] | |
####List application aliases
    GET https://localhost/broker/rest/domains/domain69/applications/application69/aliases
[root@ip-10-154-134-18 ~]# ./test.rb 
Doing............ADD_DOMAIN..........
Doing............ADD_APPLICATION..........
Setting cartridges to the first value in ["diy-0.1", "php-5.3", "jbossas-7", "perl-5.10", "mock-0.1", "mock-0.2", "zend-5.6", "jenkins-1.4", "nodejs-0.6", "jbossews-2.0", "jbossews-1.0", "jbosseap-6.0", "python-2.6", "python-2.7", "python-3.3", "ruby-1.9", "ruby-1.8"]
Setting scale to false
Setting gear_profile to small
Doing............ADD_CARTRIDGE..........
Setting name to the first ["mongodb-2.2", "cron-1.4", "phpmyadmin-3.4", "haproxy-1.4", "mock-plugin-0.1", "10gen-mms-agent-0.1", "postgresql-8.4", "switchyard-0.6", "metrics-0.1", "jenkins-client-1.4", "mysql-5.1", "rockmongo-1.1"]
Setting colocate_with to the first value in ["diy-0.1"]
Doing............ADD_ALIAS..........
[{"exit_code"=>105, "field"=>nil, "severity"=>"error", "text"=>"Invalid Server Alias 'alias19' specified"}]
ValidationException  Invalid Server Alias 'alias19' specified
Doing............ADD_AUTHORIZATION..........
Setting scope to userinfo
Setting expires_in to -1
Setting reuse to false
